column4: I have my SVN server in windows server and the network runs on DHCP how I can checkout with pc name .... ubuntu is not able to connect with PC name
I think you need samba to resolve windows machine names
Do you have connectivity with the machine, does ping work?
i can ping with ip but not machine name
Either add a line in /etc/hosts to add an allias to that machine as ActionParsnip suggested or isntall samba.
